Terminal 8 FFFFFFFF
Verdana 12 FF000000
Verdana 16 FFFF0000
Verdana 16 FFFFFFFF
Verdana 12 FFFFFFFF
Verdana 12 FFFFFFFF
Verdana 12 FFFFFFFF
1
0 200 300 550 320
100% 20 0 FF888888
Center 0 3 100% 20 ComBot by Tehtsuo/Vendan
FF000000 r40 0 40 20 Close
endscript ComBot
FF000000 r120 0 40 20 Hide
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Hidden} { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Hide This:SetText[Show] } else { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Show This:SetText[Hide] }
if ${UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot].Visible} { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Hide This:SetText[Show] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetHidden[TRUE] } else { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Show This:SetText[Hide] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetHidden[FALSE] }
FF000000 r80 0 40 20 Help
timedcommand 0 "OSExecute http://combot.vendaria.net"
FF000000 0 0 40 20 Run
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot.Paused} { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Resume } else { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Pause }
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot.Paused} { relay all Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Resume } else { relay all Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Pause }
0 5 100% 100%
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0 0 100% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
FF000000 0 0 100% 90%
FF000000 1% 92% 48% 6%
variable int counter if !${This.SelectedItem.Value.Equal[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.ComBot_Mode}]} { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetComBot_Mode[${This.SelectedItem.Value}] for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${This.Items} ; counter:Inc ) { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.${This.OrderedItem[${counter}].Value}:Stop } } if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.UI.Reloaded} { if !${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot.Paused} { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.UI:Update["ComBot", "Paused", "r"] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Pause } }
FF000000 50% 92% 20% 6% Configuration
timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic.Behaviors[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.ComBot_Mode}].ConfigPath}${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.ComBot_Mode}.xml\""
75% 92% 48% 6% Start automatically
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.AutoStart} { This:SetChecked }
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetAutoStart[${This.Checked}]
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0 0 100% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
1% 50% 48% 6% Disable 3D Rendering
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Disable3D} { This:SetChecked } This:SetZOrder[movetop]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisable3D[${This.Checked}] This:SetZOrder[movetop]
51% 50% 48% 6% Auto-close Chat Invites
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.CloseChatInvites} { This:SetChecked } This:SetZOrder[movetop]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetCloseChatInvites[${This.Checked}] This:SetZOrder[movetop]
1% 58% 48% 6% Disable User Interface
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.DisableUI} { This:SetChecked } This:SetZOrder[movetop]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisableUI[${This.Checked}] This:SetZOrder[movetop]
1% 66% 48% 6% Disable Texture Loading
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.DisableTexture} { This:SetChecked } This:SetZOrder[movetop]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisableTexture[${This.Checked}] This:SetZOrder[movetop]
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0% 0% 29% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
1% 5% 98% 10% Center Auto-Login
51% 20% 48% 20% Center Password
51% 38% 48% 25% *
This:SetText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Password}]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetPassword[${This.Text}]
1% 20% 48% 30% Center Account
1% 38% 48% 25%
This:SetText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Account}]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetAccount[${This.Text}]
FF000000 1% 70% 98% 25% Generate Innerspace Profile
Uplink "SettingXML[GameConfiguration.XML].Set[${Game}].Set[Profiles]:AddSet[${Me.Name}]" variable int KeyNumber for (KeyNumber:Set[1]; ${KeyNumber} <= ${Profile.Keys}; KeyNumber:Inc) { Uplink "SettingXML[GameConfiguration.XML].Set[${Game}].Set[Profiles].Set[${Me.Name}]:Set[${Profile.Key[${KeyNumber}].Escape}, ${Profile.GetString[${Profile.Key[${KeyNumber}]}].Escape.Escape}]" } Uplink "SettingXML[GameConfiguration.XML].Set[${Game}].Set[Profiles].Set[${Me.Name}]:AddSet[Startup Sequence]" Uplink "SettingXML[GameConfiguration.XML].Set[${Game}].Set[Profiles].Set[${Me.Name}].Set[Startup Sequence]:Set[ComBot Launcher,run combot \"${Me.Name}\"]" Uplink "SettingXML[GameConfiguration.XML]:Save"
2% 81% 48% 6% Fleet Management
FF000000 20% 80% 58% 6%
This:AddItem[No Fleet] variable iterator FleetIterator Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets.Fleets:GetSetIterator[FleetIterator] if ${FleetIterator:First(exists)} { do { This:AddItem[${FleetIterator.Key}] } while ${FleetIterator:Next(exists)} } This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets.Active}]:Select
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets:SetActive[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Fleets.WingTranslation:Clear Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Fleets.SquadTranslation:Clear
FF000000 79% 80% 10% 6% Save
timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"${Script[ComBot].CurrentDirectory}/interface/ComBotGUI_NewFleet.xml\""
FF000000 89% 80% 10% 6% Delete
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Fleets:DeleteFleet[${UIElement[FleetSelection@Settings@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}]
FF000000 1% 32% 32% 8% Go Home
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Automate:GotoLogoutNow
relay all Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Automate:GotoLogoutNow
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0 0 100% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
1% 2% 32% 5% Center Behavior Pending States
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 1% 6% 32% 58%
34% 2% 32% 5% Center Active Modules
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 34% 6% 32% 58%
67% 2% 32% 5% Center Idle Modules
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 67% 6% 32% 58%
2% 66% 98% 5% IRC/Forum name (Not your EVE account name!)
1% 71% 98% 6%
This:SetText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.LogUser}]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetLogUser[${This.Text}]
2% 79% 99% 5% Description of the problem you are reporting
1% 84% 98% 6%
1% 93% 20% 6% Verbose logging
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Verbose} { This:SetChecked } This:SetZOrder[movetop]
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetVerbose[${This.Checked}] This:SetZOrder[movetop]
FF000000 22% 93% 77% 6% Upload logs
httpget -postparam username "${UIElement[Name@Debug@ComBotTab@ComBot].Text.Escape}" -postparam semantic "${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.ComBot_Mode.Escape}" -postparam description "${UIElement[Description@Debug@ComBotTab@ComBot].Text.Escape}" -postfile logfile "${Script[ComBot].CurrentDirectory.Replace[\\,/].Escape}${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.UI.LogFile.Right[-1].Escape}" http://combot.vendaria.net/logs/upload UIElement[Description@Debug@ComBotTab@ComBot]:SetText[""]

FF000000 40% 40% 20% 10% Enable/Disable
variable string ItemText if ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { ItemText:Set[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic:ActivateMiniMode[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot]:AddItem[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}, ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem:Remove UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].ItemByText[${ItemText}]:Select } elseif ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { ItemText:Set[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic:DeactivateMiniMode[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot]:AddItem[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}, ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem:Remove UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].ItemByText[${ItemText}]:Select } echo Active ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} Inactive ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems}
FF000000 40% 50% 20% 10% Config
if ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic.MiniModes[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}].ConfigPath}${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}.xml\"" } elseif ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic.MiniModes[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}].ConfigPath}${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}.xml\"" }
